targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  b1.hostname,
  b1.application,
  b1.backup_type,
  MAX(b1.timestamp) as last_backup,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, MAX(b1.timestamp), UTC_TIMESTAMP()) as hours_ago
FROM backups b1
WHERE b1.hostname IN ($hostname)
  AND b1.backup_level IN ($backup_level)
GROUP BY b1.hostname, b1.application, b1.backup_type
HAVING TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, MAX(b1.timestamp), UTC_TIMESTAMP()) > 216
ORDER BY hours_ago DESC

SELECT
  application,
  hostname,
  MAX(timestamp) as last_updated
FROM updates
WHERE hostname IN ($hostname)
GROUP BY application, hostname
HAVING MAX(timestamp) < UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 14 DAY
ORDER BY MAX(timestamp) ASC

SELECT h1.hostname, h1.check_name, h1.check_status, h1.check_value, h1.check_detail, h1.timestamp FROM health_checks h1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT hostname, check_name, MAX(timestamp) as max_ts FROM health_checks GROUP BY hostname, check_name ) h2 ON h1.hostname = h2.hostname AND h1.check_name = h2.check_name AND h1.timestamp = h2.max_ts WHERE h1.check_status != 'ok' AND h1.hostname IN ($hostname) ORDER BY h1.timestamp DESC

SELECT 
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(timestamp)) as time_sec,
  backup_type as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM backups
WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 90 DAY
  AND backup_type IN ($backup_type)
  AND hostname IN ($hostname)
  AND backup_level IN ($backup_level)
GROUP BY DATE(timestamp), backup_type
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT 
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(timestamp)) as time_sec,
  update_type as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM updates
WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 90 DAY
  AND hostname IN ($hostname)
  AND update_subtype IN ($update_subtype)
GROUP BY DATE(timestamp), update_type
ORDER BY time_sec

panels.title: Updates Over Time by Host Type

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(timestamp)) as time_sec,
  subtype as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM maintenance
WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 90 DAY
  AND hostname IN ($hostname)
  AND subtype IN ($maintenance_subtype)
GROUP BY DATE(timestamp), subtype
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT 
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(timestamp)) as time_sec,
  application as metric,
  ROUND(AVG(file_size), 2) as value
FROM backups
WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 90 DAY
  AND file_size > 0
  AND file_name NOT LIKE 'FAILED_%'
  AND backup_type IN ($backup_type)
  AND hostname IN ($hostname)
  AND backup_level IN ($backup_level)
GROUP BY DATE(timestamp), application
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(timestamp)) as time_sec, check_name as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM health_checks WHERE check_status != 'ok' AND timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 90 DAY AND hostname IN ($hostname) GROUP BY DATE(timestamp), check_name ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(timestamp)) as time_sec, CONCAT(operation, ' — ', status) as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM restores WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 90 DAY AND hostname IN ($hostname) GROUP BY DATE(timestamp), operation, status ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT 
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(timestamp)) as time_sec,
  hostname as metric,
  ROUND(SUM(file_size), 0) as value
FROM backups
WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 90 DAY
  AND file_size > 0
  AND file_name NOT LIKE 'FAILED_%'
  AND backup_level IN ($backup_level)
  AND hostname IN ($hostname)
GROUP BY DATE(timestamp), hostname
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT 
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(timestamp)) as time_sec,
  backup_level as metric,
  ROUND(SUM(file_size), 0) as value
FROM backups
WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 90 DAY
  AND file_size > 0
  AND file_name NOT LIKE 'FAILED_%'
  AND hostname IN ($hostname)
GROUP BY DATE(timestamp), backup_level
ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(timestamp)) as time_sec, CONCAT(hostname, ' — images') as metric, ROUND(MAX(images_mb), 0) as value FROM docker_sizes WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 90 DAY AND hostname IN ($hostname) GROUP BY DATE(timestamp), hostname UNION ALL SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(timestamp)), CONCAT(hostname, ' — volumes'), ROUND(MAX(volumes_mb), 0) FROM docker_sizes WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 90 DAY AND hostname IN ($hostname) GROUP BY DATE(timestamp), hostname ORDER BY time_sec

SELECT hostname, images_count, ROUND(images_mb, 0) as images_mb, volumes_count, ROUND(volumes_mb, 0) as volumes_mb, ROUND(COALESCE(containers_mb, 0), 0) as containers_mb, ROUND(images_mb + volumes_mb + COALESCE(containers_mb, 0), 0) as total_mb, timestamp FROM docker_sizes d1 WHERE timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM docker_sizes d2 WHERE d2.hostname = d1.hostname) AND hostname IN ($hostname) ORDER BY total_mb DESC

SELECT backup_subtype, COUNT(*) as count 
FROM backups 
WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 30 DAY 
  AND backup_type IN ($backup_type)
  AND hostname IN ($hostname)
GROUP BY backup_subtype 
ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT update_subtype, COUNT(*) as count FROM updates WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 30 DAY AND hostname IN ($hostname) GROUP BY update_subtype ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT subtype, COUNT(*) as count FROM maintenance WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 30 DAY AND hostname IN ($hostname) GROUP BY subtype ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT hostname, COUNT(*) as total_backups FROM backups WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 30 DAY AND backup_type IN ($backup_type) AND hostname IN ($hostname) GROUP BY hostname ORDER BY total_backups DESC

SELECT application, COUNT(*) as count FROM updates WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 30 DAY AND hostname IN ($hostname) AND update_subtype IN ($update_subtype) GROUP BY application ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT 
  b1.hostname,
  b1.application,
  b1.backup_level,
  b1.timestamp as last_success,
  DATEDIFF(UTC_TIMESTAMP(), b1.timestamp) as days_ago,
  ROUND(b1.file_size, 2) as file_size_mb
FROM backups b1
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT hostname, application, MAX(timestamp) as max_ts
  FROM backups
  WHERE file_name NOT LIKE 'FAILED_%'
  GROUP BY hostname, application
) b2 ON b1.hostname = b2.hostname AND b1.application = b2.application AND b1.timestamp = b2.max_ts
WHERE b1.hostname IN ($hostname)
  AND b1.backup_level IN ($backup_level)
ORDER BY b1.hostname, b1.backup_level, b1.application

SELECT 
  u1.hostname,
  u1.application,
  u1.update_subtype,
  u1.version,
  u1.timestamp as last_success,
  DATEDIFF(UTC_TIMESTAMP(), u1.timestamp) as days_ago
FROM updates u1
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT hostname, application, MAX(timestamp) as max_ts
  FROM updates
  WHERE status = 'success'
  GROUP BY hostname, application
) u2 ON u1.hostname = u2.hostname AND u1.application = u2.application AND u1.timestamp = u2.max_ts
WHERE u1.hostname IN ($hostname)
  AND u1.update_subtype IN ($update_subtype)
ORDER BY u1.hostname, u1.update_subtype, u1.application

SELECT 
  timestamp,
  backup_type, 
  backup_subtype, 
  backup_level,
  hostname, 
  application, 
  file_name, 
  file_size 
FROM backups
WHERE backup_type IN ($backup_type)
  AND hostname IN ($hostname)
  AND backup_level IN ($backup_level)
ORDER BY id DESC 
LIMIT 50

SELECT 
  timestamp,
  update_type, 
  update_subtype, 
  hostname, 
  application, 
  version,
  status
FROM updates
WHERE hostname IN ($hostname)
  AND update_subtype IN ($update_subtype)
ORDER BY id DESC 
LIMIT 50

SELECT 
  timestamp,
  application,
  hostname,
  type,
  subtype,
  status
FROM maintenance
WHERE hostname IN ($hostname)
  AND subtype IN ($maintenance_subtype)
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT 
  timestamp,
  operation,
  restore_type,
  restore_subtype,
  hostname,
  application,
  source_file,
  status,
  detail
FROM restores
WHERE hostname IN ($hostname)
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT restore_subtype, COUNT(*) as restores FROM restores WHERE timestamp >= UTC_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 30 DAY AND hostname IN ($hostname) AND restore_subtype IN ($restore_subtype) GROUP BY restore_subtype ORDER BY restores DESC

SELECT 
  timestamp,
  playbook,
  hostname,
  run_vars
FROM playbook_runs
WHERE hostname IN ($hostname)
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 50
SELECT playbook, COUNT(*) as runs FROM playbook_runs WHERE created_at > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY playbook ORDER BY runs DESC

SELECT 
  u1.update_type, 
  u1.update_subtype, 
  u1.hostname, 
  u1.application, 
  u1.version, 
  u1.status,
  u1.timestamp as last_updated 
FROM updates u1 
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT application, hostname, MAX(timestamp) as max_timestamp 
  FROM updates 
  GROUP BY application, hostname
) u2 ON u1.application = u2.application 
  AND u1.hostname = u2.hostname 
  AND u1.timestamp = u2.max_timestamp 
WHERE u1.hostname IN ($hostname)
ORDER BY u1.update_type, u1.hostname, u1.application

panels.title: Current Version Status by Host Type

targets.rawSql: SELECT h1.hostname, h1.check_name, h1.check_status, h1.check_value, h1.check_detail, h1.timestamp as last_checked FROM health_checks h1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT hostname, check_name, MAX(timestamp) as max_ts FROM health_checks GROUP BY hostname, check_name ) h2 ON h1.hostname = h2.hostname AND h1.check_name = h2.check_name AND h1.timestamp = h2.max_ts WHERE h1.hostname IN ($hostname) ORDER BY h1.hostname, h1.check_name
SELECT timestamp, hostname, check_name, check_status, check_value FROM health_checks WHERE hostname IN ($hostname) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50

list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT hostname FROM backups UNION SELECT DISTINCT hostname FROM updates UNION SELECT DISTINCT hostname FROM health_checks ORDER BY hostname

list.label: Backup Type
list.name: backup_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT backup_type FROM backups ORDER BY backup_type

list.label: Backup Level
list.name: backup_level
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT backup_level FROM backups ORDER BY backup_level

list.label: Update Subtype
list.name: update_subtype
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT update_subtype FROM updates ORDER BY update_subtype

list.label: Maintenance Subtype
list.name: maintenance_subtype
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT subtype FROM maintenance ORDER BY subtype

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT restore_subtype FROM restores WHERE restore_subtype IS NOT NULL ORDER BY restore_subtype
list.name: restore_subtype
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT restore_subtype FROM restores WHERE restore_subtype IS NOT NULL ORDER BY restore_subtype
list.label: Restore Subtype
